product_details.title: Shabab Tuwaiq Product
product_details.description: We help you at Etemad to finance your consumer and educational expenses to support you in your university stage.

list.third: Financing the payment of university and school fees

list.second: The applicant must be a Saudi national
list.third: Minimum of one academic term and a stipend of 800 SAR
list.fifth: Minimum financing of 1,500 SAR and a maximum of 4,000 SAR
